abstract: Former NBA player Lamar Odom's speech is improving as he undergoes therapy in Los Angeles.
lead_paragraph: Odom, the former N.B.A. player and reality television star, was improving as he underwent therapy in Los Angeles more than a week after he was found unconscious in a Nevada brothel.
snippet: Odom, the former N.B.A. player and reality television star, was improving as he underwent therapy in Los Angeles more than a week after he was found unconscious in a Nevada brothel.
